info.description: The Azure Analysis Services Web API provides a RESTful set of web services that enables users to create, retrieve, update, and delete Analysis Services servers
info.title: AzureAnalysisServices

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.description: The region name which the operation will lookup into.
parameters.name: location

get.description: Gets all the Analysis Services servers for the given resource group.

parameters.description: The name of the Analysis Services server. It must be at least 3 characters in length, and no more than 63.

patch.description: Updates the current state of the specified Analysis Services server.

requestBody.description: Request object that contains the updated information for the server.

parameters.description: The name of the Analysis Services server. It must be a minimum of 3 characters, and a maximum of 63.

201.description: InProgress. The operation is still completing.

202.description: Preparing. The operation is still completing.

parameters.description: The name of the Analysis Services server. It must be at least 3 characters in length, and no more than 63.

post.description: Dissociates a Unified Gateway associated with the server.

ResourceGroupNameParameter.description: The name of the Azure Resource group of which a given Analysis Services server is part. This name must be at least 1 character in length, and no more than 90.
ResourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName

SubscriptionIdParameter.description: A unique identifier for a Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId

AnalysisServicesServer.description: Represents an instance of an Analysis Services resource.

properties.description: Properties of the provision operation request.

AnalysisServicesServerMutableProperties.description: An object that represents a set of mutable Analysis Services resource properties.

asAdministrators.description: A collection of AS server administrators

backupBlobContainerUri.description: The SAS container URI to the backup container.

gatewayDetails.description: The gateway details configured for the AS server.

ipV4FirewallSettings.description: The firewall settings for the AS server.

managedMode.description: The managed mode of the server (0 = not managed, 1 = managed).

querypoolConnectionMode.description:
How the read-write server's participation in the query pool is controlled.
It can have the following values:
  • readOnly - indicates that the read-write server is intended not to participate in query operations
  • all - indicates that the read-write server can participate in query operations
Specifying readOnly when capacity is 1 results in error.

serverMonitorMode.description: The server monitor mode for AS server

provisioningState.description: The current deployment state of Analysis Services resource. The provisioningState is to indicate states for resource provisioning.

serverFullName.description: The full name of the Analysis Services resource.

sku.description: The SKU of the Analysis Services resource.

state.description: The current state of Analysis Services resource. The state is to indicate more states outside of resource provisioning.

tags.description: Key-value pairs of additional provisioning properties.

properties.description: Properties of the provision operation request.

sku.description: The SKU of the Analysis Services resource.

AnalysisServicesServers.description: An array of Analysis Services resources.

value.description: An array of Analysis Services resources.

CheckServerNameAvailabilityParameters.description: Details of server name request body.

type.description: The resource type of azure analysis services.

CheckServerNameAvailabilityResult.description: The checking result of server name availability.

message.description: The detailed message of the request unavailability.

nameAvailable.description: Indicator of available of the server name.

ErrorAdditionalInfo.description: The resource management error additional info.

ErrorResponse.description: Describes the format of Error response.

gatewayObjectId.description: Gateway object id from in the DMTS cluster for the gateway resource.

gatewayResourceId.description: Gateway resource to be associated with the server.

error.description: Error of the list gateway status.

status.description: Live message of list gateway. Status: 0 - Live

enablePowerBIService.description: The indicator of enabling PBI service.

LogSpecifications.description: The log metric specification for exposing performance metrics to shoebox.

blobDuration.description: The blob duration for the log.

MetricSpecifications.description: Available operation metric specification for exposing performance metrics to shoebox.

display.description: The object that represents the operation.

operation.description: Operation type: Read, write, delete, etc.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed: UsageDetail, etc.

properties.description: Additional properties to expose performance metrics to shoebox.

OperationListResult.description: Result of listing consumption operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL link to get the next set of results.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

value.description: List of analysis services operations supported by the Microsoft.AnalysisServices resource provider.

endTime.description: The end time of the operation.

error.description: The error detail of the operation if any.

startTime.description: The start time of the operation.

Resource.description: Represents an instance of an Analysis Services resource.

tags.description: Key-value pairs of additional resource provisioning properties.

id.description: An identifier that represents the Analysis Services resource.

location.description: Location of the Analysis Services resource.

name.description: The name of the Analysis Services resource.

sku.description: The SKU of the Analysis Services resource.

type.description: The type of the Analysis Services resource.

ResourceSku.description: Represents the SKU name and Azure pricing tier for Analysis Services resource.

capacity.description: The number of instances in the read only query pool.

tier.description: The name of the Azure pricing tier to which the SKU applies.

ServerAdministrators.description: An array of administrator user identities.

members.description: An array of administrator user identities.

items.description: The UPN of the user. For example: johnsmith@contoso.com.

SkuDetailsForExistingResource.description: An object that represents SKU details for existing resources.

sku.description: The SKU in SKU details for existing resources.

SkuEnumerationForExistingResourceResult.description: An object that represents enumerating SKUs for existing resources.

value.description: The collection of available SKUs for existing resources.

SkuEnumerationForNewResourceResult.description: An object that represents enumerating SKUs for new resources.

value.description: The collection of available SKUs for new resources.
